entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Lambton Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:11 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or drizzle. Low plus 1 with temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle late this evening and after midnight. Rain beginning after midnight. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Low plus 1 with temperature rising to 6 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023
